name: Train Heist
description:
This is my first ever 3d project using the unity engine.

This prototype was spawned as my attempt to take my Six Shot Hell prototype and make it 3D. With Trains.

There is no goal, its just a fun little project.

You can use keyboard or Controller!

Update: vo.o2 Fixed Reload sound issue, Fixed Some of the collision bugs.

Update: I have disabled the Mac and Linux options as I cannot guarantee they will function. I will release a Mac compatible build in the next week.
